message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you 40% and take 60%. What do you say?
I'll give you a smaller share, but still a decent one. You can't expect everything, can you?
You're being a bit greedy, Bob. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. This is a fair split.
I'm willing to meet you halfway. This is a fair compromise. Take it or leave it!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. Let's make a deal and split it fairly. I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share.
